subject: Urgent Business Proposal.
body:
Urgent Business Proposal.
My name is Mr. Desmond Campbell, I work with the investor's center of the London stock exchange group Plc. We have for some years now, been dealing with some unclaimed shares running to the tune of 8.4 Million Thousand Pounds and recently my boss secretly decided to sell it off with the intention that the two of us will make use of the fund for investment outside the stock house.
An American investor has paid for the unclaimed shares in Dollars and the cash has been received and saved in China Citic Bank (CCB) for onward movement outside the Country. But unfortunately, my boss passed away two months ago, and the family has read his last testament (WILL) without mentioning anything about this cash deposited in China Citic Bank (CCB).
So, at this point, I was the only person that knows this deal and where this money is. But,  since I cannot do it alone, I contacted my boss wife and told her all that transpired while her husband was alive and I am the only trusted partner who knows about this money because of this, she has given me the go ahead order to make sure I get a trusted person  overseas who will receive this fund and share it, so that her family will make use of their own share of the money to complete her husbandâ€™s intention and his soul will rest in peace.
The total amount in Dollars is US$10,636,352.96 and this amount is still available in China Citic Bank (CCB). Reply via my private email: ( 
mrdesmondcampbell937@gmail.com
 ), while a legal practitioner will use these details to get a legal permit for you to receive this cash outside this Country for our sharing. You will be given 30% out of the total sum.
Your cooperation is highly expected to help this widow and her children. Make sure that you respond to this my private email address: 
mrdesmondcampbell937@gmail.com
Yours truly,
Mr. Desmond Campbell
mrdesmondcampbell937@gmail.com

subject: Re: Urgent Business Proposal.
body:
Hello Mr. Desmond Campbell,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this intriguing proposal. I must say, it's quite an interesting situation you find yourself in. I'm sorry to hear about the passing of your boss.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. How did you come across my contact information? And why do you believe that I would be the right person to help with this matter?

Also, could you please provide more details about the investment plans? What kind of investments are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christina
